body.raw:
{
    "nombre": "Chocolates Ferrero-Rocher",
    "descripcion": "Ferrero Rocher is a chocolate sweet made by Italian chocolatier Ferrero SpA. The chocolates consist of a whole roasted hazelnut encased in a thin wafer shell filled with hazelnut cream including vegetable oil and covered in milk chocolate and chopped hazelnuts.",
    "imagen": "https://cakestudio.in/cakestudio_polkadot/files/item/primary_photo/59f40839-df14-46b9-b6f9-404c6aba72de/ferrero-rocher-8-pcs_1599.jpg",
    "precioPromedio": 20000,
    "genero": "N",
    "calificacionPromedio": 4.8
}

request.description: This request creates a new gift. The API returns the created resource with the assigned id.

response.name: Add a gift

request.description: This request gets all the available gifts. The API returns all the gifts. It is important to highlight that, as a design decision, these gifts also include the stores (Tiendas) where they are sold and the categories they belong to (which are the many to many relations of the Gift resource).

response.name: Get all gifts

request.description: This request gets the gift with the given gift_id. The API returns that particular gift. It is important to highlight that, as a design decision, this gift also include the stores (Tiendas) where it is sold and the categories it belongs to (which are the many to many relations of the Gift resource).

response.name: Get one gift

exec: pm.expect(data.message).to.eql("El regalo con el ID dado no fue encontrado");

request.description: This request is the case in which an invalid gift (non-existent) is tried to be retrieved. The API responds with a 404 error.

response.name: Get an invalid gift

response.name: Update a gift

request.description: This request corresponds to the case in which an invalid (non-existent) gift is tried to be deleted. The API responds with a 404 error.

response.name: Delete an invalid gift
